name: sfw-bluesky
description: A modified Bluesky client with enforced NSFW content filtering

scripts.prepare: git clone https://github.com/bluesky-social/social-app.git temp-social-app && cp -r temp-social-app/* . && rm -rf temp-social-app
scripts.apply-changes: mkdir -p src/customization && cp -f src/customization/hard-coded-prefs.ts src/customization/ && cp -f src/components/moderation/ContentHider.tsx src/components/moderation/ && cp -f src/state/preferences/moderation-opts.tsx src/state/preferences/
scripts.build-web: yarn prepare && yarn install && cd bskyweb && yarn build
